WKI_Summary: eTail V2 HCH_ScanCompleteTime column is exposed for updates via trigger
details: DONE  HCH_ScanCompleteTime column is exposed for updates via trigger    BACKGROUND:  HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowEditForm&ControllerID=SupportIncident&BusinessEntityPK=b603f337-b3e7-40e6-9499-5049ac346c26&VersionNumber=24.10.23.55&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd&Hash=%2bKsKfPc%2fP1h27z%2bc2Yvrf%2b6kY5VMKgvgz" CS01770430 - NEWPOSAKL1 - Trigering Scanning Complete from a custom evetn import  The NZ POST are implementing the following:  " ...  We are attempting to use the Shipment selection screen in the portals as an easy lookup dashboard for operators to understand the shipments which have. Using milestones, but the lack of ability to update certain fields and visuals across the CW1 UI and the portals makes it difficult. We have allocated the below milestone and fields to an "Arrival flow" in this order , ( we are aware these are not the "right fields to use" but they are the best we have available given the above constraint):    1.Arrived on Site - Physically ( Barcode scan of S-Job ID and sent as Z71 event to XUE import)  2.Arrived and Cleared - (Milestone based on Arrived and Has had a delivery order sent + condition that Z71 completed.)  3.Physically moved to a induction area - (Barcode scan of S-Job ID and sent as Z73 event to XUE import) - Sets Storage Commenced Dat as <NOW>  4.Scan start time ( auto-populated once 1st item in HVLV s-Job has a scan)   5.Scanning Completed ( We wish to set the scan Complete time field with current time via XUE import of an event either a custom Z74 event as current , or a SSC with ref TYP = Last Item ) we are looking to do this as we do not want our operators to have to go and click into each shipment and clicking  scanning complete - We have a barcode scan solution of the S-Job which allows operators to continue working.   Attached doc containss details of what we're trying to do: HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowStorageDoc&BusinessEntityPK=12abd423-115b-435a-8a46-01db1048b47b&StorageDocPK=1abcd890-4d9d-4f10-96c9-45147c4cbe59&Hash=%2bLxMknnjXogmN9euZLz9lAncbnkJN0WBI&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd" DFC 24-Oct-24 12:20:  File Set Scan complete and inbound Arrival milestone flow.docx (Client Correspondence / Screenshots)  ...  "  The customer is currently unable to do #5 because HCH_ScanCompleteTime column is not exposed for changes via triggers. WKI_Summary: New EventType&DBTransformation - AccGLHeader AccBankAccount AccChequeBook
details: HDG 13-Aug-25 11:19 GMT+08:00:   SCOPE OF THIS WI?  AccGLHeader   AccBankAccount    AccChequeBook     To Dev, make necessary changes against listed tables, so that  1. With this change, newly created EDT & ADD event with reference, will use new event type "AEL - Accounting Edit Log" (to replace EDT) and "AAL - Accounting Add Log" (to replace ADD).   2. Transformation of existing EDT event with reference to AEL, transformation of existing ADD event with reference to AAL.  3. No ADD/EDT event without reference should be created in Logs tab.   4. Workflow&Trigger related to ADD/EDT event should still fire as expected, but the event should not be created in Logs.   5. After the change, reports that use data from stmalog (related to these tables) should keep working as normal.  6. Create TAN document     To Product,   a. Make sure FR covers all scenarios listed in 1~5 above.  b.Update Note should be created with below key points:  Point 1 - When AAL and/or AEL event with reference will be logged.  Point 2 - Transformation of existing ADD and/or EDT event with event reference to AAL/AEL event with event reference.  Point 3 - The system ceased to auto record ADD and EDT events with/without event reference  Point 4 - Where work flow and trigger action are relevant, the ADD and EDT events will continue to be triggered but will not be logged.   Point 5 - That users should adjust their work flow template to use the new AAL/AEL event codes instead of ADD/EDT event codes. WKI_Summary: CPW: Add 'View Party Risk' to search screen actions
details: GMO 23-Jan-25 00:34 GMT+11:00:     Problem Statement     We have removed the ‘View Compliance Status’ action on the ComplianceWise system.  As we can see from Rohlig’s process, this can be a handy tool to prioritise the screening of parties to jobs that are due to depart soon.    See customer incident regarding this: HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowEditForm&ControllerID=SupportIncident&BusinessEntityPK=249b167c-7445-4b8f-b15a-031d507bf69e&VersionNumber=25.1.14.50&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd&Hash=%2bTw1kWi6VDCwvrSOEVy2TS%2bhdGGXS%2fTEZ" CS01848015 - MALALEMEM - Screening more than one shipment at a time  ESC: HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowStorageDoc&BusinessEntityPK=06a544a4-f9a9-485e-a8f9-4e9de0632a35&StorageDocPK=2e0422cf-5a2d-49eb-aa8f-983a79f949f6&Hash=%2brLXcPwEynPsGJKNcoaJIGez6XTCvF1rb&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd" GMO 23-Jan-25 00:48:  File Add 'View Party Risk' to search screen actions ESC.docx (Escalation Document) for screenshots of actions.     Solution:   Add the ‘View Party Risk’ action to search screen of jobs that have ComplianceWise implemented (Shipments, Consolidations, Bookings).  (This should folow a similar pattern to the DPS for jobs 'View Compliance Status' action as it is the compliancewise equivalent.)     DONE Statement:  GIVEN I am on a module where ComplianceWise is implemented  WHEN I am on the search screen and highlight multiple jobs  THEN I can right click and click Actions > View Party Risk   THEN The 'party risk summary' window will display all parties included on all highlighted shipments.
product_candidate: Add 'View Party Risk' to search screen actions

WKI_Summary: Improve Label Printing Speeds for Forwarding
details: BPD 07-Oct-24 15:34 GMT+11:00:     Detailed Build Design :  Investigation : The main goal of this work item is to improve label  printing speeds for Shipment Label documents by printing all labels in one document,  for Freight Label and Freight Label with Unique ID .  The pause customer complained about is caused because printer prints multiple documents one by one, "This is the document for forwarding shipment, and there are multiple print label documents are generated when you print this document, then printer will print them one by one, just like pause, there is no pause, just print multiple documents one by one." HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowEditForm&ControllerID=SupportIncident&BusinessEntityPK=de5d16f1-9e53-4ae5-a796-38f683ae017d&VersionNumber=24.10.7.3&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd&Hash=%2b9UHHiNsylalXEq1UPgPluVUIr2ib%2ffVq" CS01537895 - INTSCMLAX - Pause when printing labels   and from this work item , we want to provide a single document with all labels in multiple pages to address this.  Please find HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowStorageDoc&BusinessEntityPK=10c5d0ed-eed4-40b1-a47e-551d88b0d3a8&StorageDocPK=590d7cda-b8b1-413c-9e23-c03ff07077fd&Hash=%2bNQgFINJI%2bWf1EN9tSvpOmLXvEtmgmYVJ&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd" BPD 07-Oct-24 15:22:  File WI00795931_DetailDesignNotes.docx (Internal Correspondence) , I have added snapshots of how the label prints can be previewed and the difference between number of documents.    Suggested changes:  a)  Create new datacontext options for printing Shipment freight labels in a single document:, for documents: Freight Label (GenericFreightJobByPackages1Doc) and Freight Label with Unique ID (GenericFreightJobBySelectedPackages1Doc)     In /Enterprise/Product/Core/Resources/Resources/Constants   please introduce two new contexts : public enum DataContext{..}    GenericFreightJobByPackages1Doc    GenericFreightJobBySelectedPackages1Doc    b) Make the changes in document wrappers to check if the user has selected any of the above two options and if they have, print the shipment label in one document.    In \Enterprise\Product\Operations\Freight\Forwarding\Forwarding.Business\Shipment\ForwardingShipmentDocumentSupporter.cs    protected override DocumentWrapper[] GetDocumentWrappersInternal(Core.Constants.DataContext dataContext, IStmMenuItem commandBeingRun)  {    //we will have to add conditions to match datacontext against GenericFreightJobByPackages1Doc and GenericFreightJobBySelectedPackages1Doc  }     currently     when DataContext is GenericFreightJobByPackages, GetGenericWrapperForPacks(dataContext) is used     when DataContext is GenericFreightJobBySelectedPackages, GetGenericWrapperForPacksInRange() is used   which create multiple documents for multiple labels,     to return one document with multiple pages , in the above conditions we can check and pass an extra parameter to the wrappers to denote if we want to print as a single document      if DataContext is GenericFreightJobByPackages  or  GenericFreightJobByPackages1Doc   {      GetGenericWrapperForPacks(dataContext, returnSingleDocument ) (returnSingleDocument would be true if datacontext is GenericFreightJobByPackages1Doc)   }     if DataContext is GenericFreightJobBySelectedPackages or GenericFreightJobBySelectedPackages1Doc   {    GetGenericWrapperForPacksInRange(returnSingleDocument) (returnSingleDocument would be true if datacontext is GenericFreightJobBySelectedPackages1Doc)   }     and modify GetGenericWrapperForPacks , GetGenericWrapperForPacksInRange to create 1 document if returnSingleDocument is true.    for example please refer to PR : https://devops.wisetechglobal.com/wtg/CargoWise/_git/Dev/pullrequest/260299    https://devops.wisetechglobal.com/wtg/CargoWise/_git/Dev?path=%2FEnterprise%2FProduct%2FOperations%2FWarehouse%2FTransitWarehouse%2FTransitWarehouse.Business%2FDispatchConsignment%2FWhsItemDispatchConsignmentDocumentSupporter.cs&version=GBmaster&line=58&lineEnd=58&lineStartColumn=1&lineEndColumn=103&lineStyle=plain&_a=contents    https://devops.wisetechglobal.com/wtg/CargoWise/_git/Dev?path=%2FEnterprise%2FProduct%2FOperations%2FPacking%2FPacking.Business%2FCommon%2FTransportPackageLabelHelper.cs&version=GBmaster&line=73&lineEnd=76&lineStartColumn=2&lineEndColumn=6&lineStyle=plain&_a=contents      CJP 03-Sep-24 10:28 GMT+10:00:   https://wisetechacademy.com/search?quickstart=1bbcb2fb-7dd7-471b-bddf-46e0b32bf1a8    TWH has improved their label printing speeds and the client needs the same to be done to those in Forwarding. Specifically the Shipment > Freight Label with Unique ID    ---    The DataContext controls what DocWrappers to produce, and the labels that are slow produce a DocWrapper (file) per page/label. Instead if we provide a single DocWrapper and   populate the Packages collection with the packages we want, it sends a single file to the printer with many pages, so it no longer pauses between printing.    Refer to this PR from TWH  https://devops.wisetechglobal.com/wtg/CargoWise/_git/Dev/pullrequest/260299?_a=files
product_candidate: Improve Label Printing Speeds for Forwarding

WKI_Summary: !CR7 - DHL [CCA] Display Status and Relevant Fields of Allocated Containers
details: Done Statement  Display Status and Relevant Fields of Containers Allocated to Allocation Route level. WKI_Summary: JO e-Invoicing | Enable Organization Reg Code IDN for JO
details: For JO e-Invoicing purpose, Debtor's national identification number will be required to transmit.   However, currently in JO, there's no Org Reg Code avail to store this number.     Please enable Org Reg Code "IDN" (Identity Card Number) for JO. No restriction.   Note: IDN has been enabled for other countries, e.g. SG.

WKI_Summary: Montenegro (ME) - Add TWO new Tax IDs to support 15% reduced VAT rate 1 Jan 2025
details: Country:  Montenegro (ME)    this WI:  a) ADD MIDPDV Tax ID (RAT) with 'MID' Rate reference  b) ADD MIDPDVREV Tax ID (RVS) with 'MID' Rate reference    c) Product to deploy a ME MID Rate reference with 15% and start date 1 Jan 2025.    TB 10-Dec-24 08:26 GMT+11:00:   Background:  In November 2024 the ME government passed laws to amend Article 24a of the VAT act and introduce a second reduced rate.  From 1 January ME VAT law supports: 21% standard rate + 15%, 7% and 0% reduced rates.    earlier notes:  On 5 September 2024, the Government of Montenegro published its Fiscal strategy for the period 2024-2027, including the introduction of an intermediate VAT rate of 15%.  The new rate is planned to be applied to the following goods and services (currently subject to the 7% reduced VAT rate):  books, monographs and serials;  accommodation services in hotels, motels, tourist resorts, boarding houses, camps, tourist apartments and villas;  currently in CW, we support 21% (Standard) and 7% (reduced) rate    HYPERLINK "https://www.vatcalc.com/montenegro/montenegro-new-15-reduced-vat-rate/" Montenegro new 15% reduced VAT rate 2025 - vatcalc.com
feature_description: Add TWO new Tax IDs to support 15% reduced VAT rate 1 Jan 2025

WKI_Summary: ACAS - Acceptable Cargo Descriptions
details: SVI 30-Jan-25 09:21 GMT+11:00: the following minor issues are to be fixed in a separate WI: HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowEditForm&ControllerID=WorkItem&BusinessEntityPK=1f741e71-c0eb-4ba6-bb4d-cbf10b122728&VersionNumber=25.1.30.84&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd&Hash=%2bn%2f3FFkPhtWf14wjWASKl%2bdUJ8mUFUXEt" WI00860912 - Enhancements  - Warning Displays for ACAS Acceptable Goods Description WI.  The warning is shown in 'Send FHL' even though FHL cannot be sent for a direct Consol- to be removed  The warning icon to be displayed in the top right-hand corner of the Description box instead of in the middle of the Details button    Done: CW displays Goods Description warning for shipments destined or transiting USA    BPD 13-Nov-24 10:29 GMT+11:00:   Detailed Build Design:    We need to check if the shipment transport mode is AIR and is destined or transiting USA,  If the above condition is true ,we need to add warning "Shipments destined or transiting USA require ‘Acceptable Cargo Descriptions’ to be provided for ACAS reporting purposes. Please ensure the Goods Description meets the reporting criteria as outlined by CBP." to the following areas:    a) The shipment ‘Description’ field.   For this in code please refer to:  In Enterprise/Product/Operations/Freight/Forwarding/Forwarding.Business/Shipment/ForwardingShipmentValidation.cs   CheckJS_GoodsDescription   If the shipment transport mode is AIR and is destined or transiting USA add:   JS_GoodsDescriptionInfo.AddWarning(Shipments destined or transiting USA require ‘Acceptable Cargo Descriptions’ to be provided for ACAS reporting purposes. Please ensure the Goods Description meets the reporting criteria as outlined by CBP." )       b) The MAWB form , in NatureAndQtyOfGoodsValidation section if Type G (Goods Description) and/or C (Consolidation) is selected is present, add warning to the row.  For this in code please refer to:   In Enterprise/Product/Operations/Freight/Forwarding/Forwarding.Business/ExportAWB/ExportAWBRateLines/NatureAndQtyOfGoodsValidation.cs   if  shipment is destined to or transiting USA  and form is MAWB (IsAttachedToMAWB) and override default (IsAWBValuesOverriddenProperty) has been enabled   add warning to rate lines when type is NatureAndQtyOfGoodsTypes.GoodsDescription or NatureAndQtyOfGoodsTypes.Consolidation    c) The HAWB form , in Nature and Quantity of Goods field for text entered on the first line  For this in code please refer to:   In Enterprise/Product/Operations/Freight/Forwarding/Forwarding.Business/ExportAWB/ExportAWBRateLines/NatureAndQtyOfGoodsValidation.cs   if  shipment is destined to or transiting USA  and  form is HAWB (IsHouseAirWayBill) and override default (IsAWBValuesOverriddenProperty) has been enabled,    add warning to only first rate line with text ((AWBRateLines.Cast<ExportAWBRateLine>().FirstOrDefault(..))    d) In Print Final Master (Cargo Interchange Messages) for ‘Send FWB’ and ‘Send FHL’  For this in code please refer to:   In /Enterprise/Product/Operations/Freight/Forwarding/Forwarding.Business/ExportAWB/AWBActions/ConsolAWBActions.cs     ValidateSendFHL()   If is destined or transiting USA    SendFHLInfo.AddWarning("Shipments destined or transiting USA require ‘Acceptable Cargo Descriptions’ to be provided for ACAS reporting purposes. Please ensure the Goods Description meets the reporting criteria as outlined by CBP.");     ValidateSendFWB()   If is destined or transiting USA    SendFWBInfo.AddWarning("Shipments destined or transiting USA require ‘Acceptable Cargo Descriptions’ to be provided for ACAS reporting purposes. Please ensure the Goods Description meets the reporting criteria as outlined by CBP.");
feature_description: Acceptable Cargo Descriptions

WKI_Summary: DPS-17: DRC Service Task Integration
details: Done:  A new service task DRS is created in CW (*Service task description pending HLD)  HostedServiceAttribute checkes feature flag  At the start of Run method, Retrieve feature flag parameters  Call Select Batch Method by corresponding fl parameter  Call Process Batch Method by the result from above  Service task is mandotory  Interval is 5 mins  Deactivate/Don't Run when no entities left       ----------------------------------------------------------------    Service task  Service task name: Denied Party Screening - Entity Reconcile Service (DER)  Service task code: DER  Service task code: DRC        Denied Party Screening Logs  Status: ERC  Status Desc.: Entity Reconciled    Workflow & Tracking > Events Log  Event code: DPE  Event Name: Denied Party Status Updated  Event Details: New Status: Unknown, Old Status: Clear, Type: Entity Reconcile  Event TYP: ERC  Event Type Name: Entity Reconcile

WKI_Summary: DPS-23: Limit orgs' status reset to supported IDs
details: Problem:  Org's Screening Status is reset on addition/modification of any ID type, even if the ID type is not supported by DPS for screening.    Solution:  WHEN there is addition/modification of non-supported IDs  THEN Screening Status will not reset  AND the EDI message for sending the org details + Screening Status is created.    Desired effects:  ? CargoWise only resets org's Screening Status only if a DPS supported ID is added or updated.  ? CargoWise send orgs details including Screening Status on ANY ID changes regardless of if it affects the Screening Status.    Currently supported IDs from DPS perspective:  DUN for Orgs [type: BUS]  PAS for Orgs [type: NAT]      NOTE: The logic for resetting Screening Status of vessels on IMO changes remains as is.
product_candidate: Limit orgs' status reset to supported IDs

WKI_Summary: GSS API: Expose CfsCutOff, HazCutOff, and ReeferCutOff in GSS API
details: TM 19-May-25 17:08 GMT+10:00:   Technical Guides - Unpublished version can be downloaded from here if required in the future https://wisetech.intelligencebank.com/resource/resource/info/90cd58ba85d54d54a22bcc41187327be      *** Needs Update Note ***    PHS 16-Feb-25 12:46 GMT+11:00:   DONE:   GSS API displays new fields:  CfsCutOff,   HazCutOff,   ReeferCutOff     Note: we need to confirm that we specify ROT_CtoCutOff if it's currently only set up as ROT_CutOff. GSS API seems to return CtoCutOff.  https://gss.wisegrid.net/index.html      WHY: GSS API has 1 field CutOff, however we are currently delivering CFS Cut-Off (from NVOCCs such as Shipco) and CTO Cut-Off (eg. from VOCCs) in that same field in GSS API, which is confusing as we and customers do not know what facility the date corresponds to, and will not help when importing in CW > consol which has separate fields for CTO Cut-Offs and CFS Cut-Offs.    This is the third/last of a series of 3 WIs:  1. HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowEditForm&ControllerID=WorkItem&BusinessEntityPK=ca38e056-b204-4f32-a319-b743fb2110c5&VersionNumber=25.2.14.89&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd&Hash=%2bEIwM0JyJz%2fgoJSJyAVGZW%2fSlxHjRpi5y" WI00869779 - BP: Add 3 new fields on Route (in BP and GSS both): CFS, Haz, and Reefer  2. HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowEditForm&ControllerID=WorkItem&BusinessEntityPK=f1750106-c692-4dc6-be8b-056e38cf2651&VersionNumber=25.2.14.89&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd&Hash=%2bxyig1xnSWPppoejFj0hU5V4gnhI4iV5l" WI00869780 - BP: populate CfsCutOff for Shipco (SCAC: SHPT)  3. HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowEditForm&ControllerID=WorkItem&BusinessEntityPK=1b4ffde0-1578-4860-9c6d-c72eb7575646&VersionNumber=25.2.14.89&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd&Hash=%2bcbIS3XRLVMI%2f9agma3LiHGCmOfyr2Ce%2b" WI00869781 - GSS API: Expose CfsCutOff, HazCutOff, and ReeferCutOff in GSS API      AYY 14-Apr-25 17:20 GMT+05:30:     WebApi\Controllers  - In the RoutesController (for both V1 and V2 versions of the API), update the CreateResponseRoute function to include and return all newly added field data.    WebApi.Data\Routes\Search  - Update SearchResultRoute record to reflect the newly added fields  - In the RouteSearcher class, update the ConvertDataRoutes function to include all newly added fields in the yield return statement.    WebApi.Models\Response  - Add all three properties into IRoute interface  - Implement all the newly added memebers in Route class (for both V1 and V2 versions)    ElasticRouteAccessor  - The Create extension method needs to be updated to include all three new fields, which will subsequently be used in the MergeRoutesByBatchAsync method.    Tests  - Update and add all the necessary tests.    Documentation  - Update https://devops.wisetechglobal.com/wtg/LogisticsServices/_wiki/wikis/LogisticsServices.wiki/3304/Global-Sailing-Schedules-API?anchor=global-sailing-schedule-routes-response
product_candidate: Expose CfsCutOff, HazCutOff, and ReeferCutOff in GSS API

WKI_Summary: TM2: Expose Receive Dock Door
details: EVG 12-Aug-25 20:32 GMT+08:00:   For functional review:    1. Please perform regression testing for   HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowEditForm&ControllerID=WorkItem&BusinessEntityPK=a34e2abd-d187-4277-9079-830db0cf4838&VersionNumber=25.5.12.18&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd&Hash=%2bdEFtLj1lrjuN5KWef72R5EUe%2bXr%2beNbD" WI00907567 - TM2: Add Dock Door to Receive Form  and HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowEditForm&ControllerID=WorkItem&BusinessEntityPK=eae23a4f-35e8-47e8-8552-51cbc29ac84b&VersionNumber=25.5.12.18&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd&Hash=%2bgZF7alFaa3q930pis6o96h%2bn2V8pADqo" WI00907572 - TM2: Add UXML support for Dock Door.   Now the inbound dockdoor functionality is exposed, so the only difference is that we no longer need to set it in the registry to see this field in desktop & import.  This field is still only mandatory if TM2 is enabled on the warehouse.    2. Please test Unload on RF and WinCE.                - The first time we scan the DockDock Location for Receive, the Inbound Dock Door will be set.                -  If the Inbound DockDoor has been provided (not set by RF or WinCE scanning), it will be changed to the scanned DockDoor.                -  If the Receive has already scanned the Dock Door, subsequent changes to the Inbound Dock Door will no longer be allowed.               -  Please also test the above in the scenario where Receive is RMA.      MMC 12-May-25 14:19 GMT+10:00:   See 'HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowEditForm&ControllerID=WorkItem&BusinessEntityPK=20422f11-c4bc-4272-9e5b-794589a29802&VersionNumber=25.5.12.18&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd&Hash=%2bdnUoByJ%2ffHPc42VcEIckEcdvxEc4SfwN" WI00897483 - TM2: Receives have a "Dockdoor"' for whole scope.    Revert all changes on WinCE and Android (+ web) related to "RecentlyUsedDockDoorLocation" prompt, as it's no longer possible to specify a different dock door to what has already been scanned on a receive.  Modify the existing dock door screen so that it sets the WD_WL_InboundDockDoor FK. Doing this should also set WD_FirstScannedInboundDockDoorUtc if it's not empty.  Webservice should verify that the dock door FK can't change if WD_FirstScannedInboundDockDoorUtc is not empty.  Change WinCE and Android so that they display a screen for scanning the provided dock door OR (if WD_FirstScannedInboundDockDoorUtc is empty) changing the dock door. Confirming the provided dockdoor should continue to the next screen, for changing the dock door (as WD_FirstScannedInboundDockDoorUtc is empty) should navigate to the old screen where a dockdoor can be entered. WKI_Summary: Registries, messages and hint adjustments for reopen period self administration
details: MNY 13-Jun-25 11:24 GMT+08:00:   Based on test result in previous WI, we have to make the adjustment on registrys, messages and hints  HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowStorageDoc&BusinessEntityPK=1a6980fe-33f4-47c2-ae64-665288aa3172&StorageDocPK=a9ab7b86-26dd-4f89-be9a-ed02668ee859&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd&Hash=%2bb%2fJV4DU%2blC2%2f4t9eH%2by0R4PW5YQHOsgq" MNY 13-Jun-25 11:25:  File WI00901510 - Implement Period Reopen Approval Logic & remove raise request if feature enable - Final UAT.xlsm (Unit Acceptance Testing)    Here are the remaining task for this WI.  o Test 1 - We should remove the new registry “Enable self-administration to reopen close periods” once all changes mentioned below are completed. And adjust the logic to show the security override form instead of the re-open key request form to be controlled by existing “Enable Users Authorized to Reopen Closed Periods” registry.     o Test 3 - We should change existing “Enable Users Authorized to Reopen Closed Periods” registry to be a non-CWSupport registry should that all users can opt to enable this feature if they wanted.    o Test 3 - We should update the registry hint of “Enable Users Authorized to Reopen Closed Periods” to as follows:  You can now opt to self-administer the re-opening of close period(s) by appointing and authorising your designated staff to re-open closed period instead of having to raise eRequest to CargoWise Support to request for Reopen Period Key.   This gives you full control of your period management and facilitate efficient reopening of closed period in a control environment.  When this registry is set to ‘Yes’, you will appoint and authorised staff to re-open closed period with their granted reopen period security right via the “Users Authorized to Reopen Closed Periods” registry.   Note: Please logout and log back in after you have set this registry to ‘Yes’.    o Test 4 - We should update the registry hint of ''User Authorized to Reopen Closed Periods' to as follows:  Only the users nominated in this list will be allowed to re-open accounting periods.   After enabling this registry, Period Reopen Levels must be defined and appropriate staff security levels assigned.       o Test 7 - The current error message is incomplete.  According to the system logic, only users that meet the following conditions can reopen a closed period.  I. The user must be one of the authorized users specified in the “Users Authorized to Reopen Closed Periods” registry  II. He/she must have the relevant security right granted to him/her under “Manage > General Ledger > Period Management > Reopen Period” taking into consideration the “Period Reopen Levels” registry configuration.  The current error message only described the part of the reasons.   Please adjust the error message as follows:  You do not have the appropriate security rights to run this function.  To reopen the period, you must fulfil the following conditions:  1. You must be one of the authorized users as specified in the ‘Users Authorized to Reopen Close Periods’ system registry.  2. You must have the relevant security right granted under “Manage > General Ledger > Period Management > Reopen Period” with reference to the required Period Reopen Level  Please reach out to your system administrator to grant you the required access. WKI_Summary: VN eInv - Non-Taxable Invoice - Negative Charges on AR Transaction
details: Under HYPERLINK "https://svc-ediprod.wtg.zone/Services/link/ShowEditForm/WorkItem/44cf67f1-856e-449b-94ab-c0e217080ae1?lang=en-gb" WI00849324 - VN eInv - Prevent posting negative value by Registry when E-Reporting is enabled, we implemented the change to force the registry "Negative Charges on AR Transaction" set to NAL (Negative charges Not Allowed - Stops users from posting negative line amounts on AR Invoice, Credit Note or Adjustment Note transactions) when VN E-reporting is enabled.   This was to prevent any negative charge lines transmittted nor rejected by FPT.     However, user reported issue under HYPERLINK "https://svc-ediprod.wtg.zone/Services/link/ShowEditForm/SupportIncident/37949629-9b28-467d-afc0-d02514cf10bc?lang=en-gb" CS01885210 - SEKWORCHI - Post AR INV with negative amounts that negative charge line is NOT allowed for a Non-Taxable invoice (Organization > Tax Details > Not Applicable), which prevented them from posting such invoice.     In this WI, we should consider allow invoices to be entered with negative charge lines if the invoice is NOT Eligible for VN e-Invoice.   1. Org > Tax Details > Not Applicable ======> Charge Tax ID =  BLANK.  2. Charge Tax ID Type = NOT  3. Charge Tax ID Type = EXL
feature_description: Non-Taxable Invoice - Negative Charges on AR Transaction

WKI_Summary: CPW: Prompt to check commodity risk when document has delivery restrictions
details: Desired effects    1. Jobs crossing international borders have been checked for commodity compliance risk prior to delivering documents with delivery restrictions (CNH, UDF)  2. Users are prompted to perform a commodity risk check (if it hasnt yet been performed) on a job crossing international borders prior to delivering documents with delivery restrictions  3. Users will not be prompted when a commodity risk check has already been performed on a job    Undesired effects  1. We prompt users to perform a risk check when a check has already been performed or declined    DONE statements    1. When a check hasn't yet been performed on a job, we prompt users to perform a commodity risk check on a job prior to delivering a document with delivery restrictions    Design specification    Present the 'Review Compliance Risk' popup when a document with delivery restrictions is to be delivered by a user on a job that crosses international borders.    A delivery restriction can be considered to be any restriction type that is not 'NON - None'    For example,  * 'CNH - Movement Restricted/Credit On Hold'  * 'UDF - User Defined'    Example document delivery restrictions  HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowStorageDoc&BusinessEntityPK=afede558-eceb-4b90-a8d5-d2a7edfd10e9&StorageDocPK=2f2fd0ca-113a-4d5c-93ef-2b127daa7d8f&Hash=%2b4ySBL8vzQRLIiWG9NzG76OIwNxtC5KHQ&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd" KMC 09-Dec-24 11:25:  File document delivery restriction settings.tif (Graphic) added to eDocs tab.    Noting, ComplianceWise currently prompts users when the delivery restriction is set to 'CNH - Movement Restricted/Credit On Hold'. It does not prompt when set to 'UDF - User Defined'    Refer to UPN for current behaviour https://wisetechacademy.com/search?quickstart=52bc442a-a57f-4277-a7ba-cbfb3e3c433c    KMC 13-Dec-24 12:29 GMT+11:00:     Second level of UDF delivery restrictions can be applied to a document.    See the note on Page 2 of https://wisetechacademy.com/search?quickstart=c3e9a42d-03a6-4ea3-a1d8-10b46cf3daec    This reads as if the document's delivery restriction can be set to NON, but a delivery restriction is still in effect per the 'Delivery Restrictions' tab.
product_candidate: Prompt to check commodity risk when document has delivery restrictions

Instead of line 318, add 3 'artificial' mappings:    - Full import container received at inland depot Barge - mapped to ARV with TransportMode=IWT  - Full import container received at inland depot Truck - mapped to ARV with TransportMode=ROA  - Full import container received at inland depot Rail - mapped to ARV with TransportMode=RAI    3.GetContainerEventsFromMoves method should have the previous event stored when iterating through event rows and set the eventType to one of the values above if the type is "Full import container received at inland depot".       LNW 10-Feb-25 13:19 GMT+11:00:     DONE: EVGL events Despatch by Barge, Despatch by Truck, Despatch by Rail and Full import container received at inland depot are mapped to:    Despatched by Barge  DEP  |Facility=CTO|Location=<eventlocation>|TransportMode=IWT  Despatched by Truck  DEP  |Facility=CTO|Location=<eventlocation>|TransportMode=ROA  Despatched by Rail  DEP  |Facility=CTO|Location=<eventlocation>|TransportMode=RAI    Event "Full import container received at inland depot" has conditional transport mode, dependant on the transport mode of the event "Despatch by..."     if "Despatched by rail" followed by "Full Import Container received at inland depot", we map "Full Import Container received at inland depot" to  ARV  Facility=CTO|Location=<eventlocation>|Transportmode=RAI    if the event is following "Despatched by Barge" we map ARV  Facility=CTO|Location=<eventlocation>|Transportmode=IWT    if the event is following "Despatched by Truck" we map ARV  Facility=CTO|Location=<eventlocation>|Transportmode=ROA      Why: the remapping from STU to DEP/ARV will assist to increase the coverage of RAIL events.    Current mappings:    Despatched by Barge:  STU  |Department=Carrier|Location=<eventlocation>|Type=Despatched by barge  Despatched by Truck: STU  |Department=Carrier|Location=<eventlocation>|Type=Despatched by rail:   Despatched by Rail: STU  |Department=Carrier|Location=<eventlocation>|Type=Despatched by truck  Full Import Container received at inland depot: STU  |Department=Carrier|Location=<eventlocation>|Type=Full import container received at inland depot      SMS 13-Feb-25 00:51 GMT+11:00: please refer to main WI for more context > WI00763454 - SS: review carrier specific STU events mapping  - also attached Linda's analysis in eDocs   HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowStorageDoc&BusinessEntityPK=e8a7519f-d153-47d1-8db2-f24f36aeeb73&StorageDocPK=e64c20c2-411e-48a1-af46-cac0793eeb2c&Hash=%2bQEx7KhmbzUmnDSMzaxFxA7Dhmc5XPxuK&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd" SMS 13-Feb-25 01:27:  File EVGL RAIL Events.xlsm (Sample File)  waiting to hear from Evergreen about DCSA pilot for tracking as they suggest to use DCSA website to find location specification (Intermodal Location codes).

WKI_Summary: CPW: Resynchronise the CPW status before delivering document
details: GMO 08-Oct-25 21:36 GMT+11:00:     As per customer incident, HYPERLINK "https://ediprod.cw.wisetechglobal.com/link/ShowEditForm/SupportIncident/113be3c1-29be-486d-8230-21cb66524bdb?lang=en-gb" CS02076651 - DSVHHS - Users are able to bypass Document Blocking when Compliance Risk is not Clear    Problem:  Customers have found a gap when two related jobs are kept open and a party is updated to one job, the change isn't reflected in the related job.     FOR EXAMPLE:  I have a Shipment open. Shipment is Clear.   Keep Shipment open.   I open a related Consolidation.   Add Matched Vessel to Consolidation   Navigate back to Shipment and try to deliver a CNH document, I am able to deliver document.     The problem is a matched party has been added to the related job, the document should not be delivered becase the JCL is now "Blocked", it just hasn't synced to be up to date.     Solution:  Proposed solution is we add the "reyncs" process when a user tries to deliver a document, before the document restrictions check is done. This way, the whether the document is restricted or not will always be based on the most up to date status.   Further development investigation
product_candidate: Resynchronise the CPW status before delivering document

WKI_Summary: Inhibit silly users sending second original (NEW) message to CDS
details: CKG 10-Jun-25 13:09 GMT+01:00:     Tech Design:    To add the blue validation error we need to add some logic to CheckMessageType in C:\git\wtg\CargoWise\Dev\Enterprise\Product\Operations\Customs\GB\Core\CDS\Message Sending\JobDeclarationMessageSendingObjectValidation.cs    In the switch statement add a case for  'NewDeclaration' (Use constant)    Now add some logic that says    IF EntryStatus (Parent.Header.CH_EntryStatus) IS NOT (REJ, CAN or blank) and Parent.ShouldSend = true   Add Blue validation (MessageError)    Consider adding a boolean property to the CusEntryHeader to determine whether CH_EntryStatus is NOT REJ, CAN or Blank, so that we can use the same method for the last part of the spec.    Maybe something like    public bool IsEntryStatusRejCanOrBlank()  {   if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(CH_EntryStatus) || CH_EntryStatus == EDIMessageStatusList.Codes.Cancelled || CH_EntryStatus == ThreeCharFunctionCode.Codes.REJ)   {    return true;   }     return false;  }    Make sure to use the wording for the validation error from the spec below, ensure to use the constant for {product name}, something like Core.Constants.ProductName    If the user still goes ahead and sends the message anyway we need to add a log against the entry header, using something like     entryHeader.Logs.AddNew(Events.CustomsEntryStatus, {MESSAGE FROM SPEC HERE});      I think we can add some logic in C:\git\wtg\CargoWise\Dev\Enterprise\Product\Operations\Customs\GB\Core\Business\GbDeclarationMessageSender.cs  Method: SendCore    Adding something like the following just before the call to SendMessageWithBondedWarehouseAutomation might do the trick    if (how is CusdecMessageFunction.New)  {      foreach (Declaration.CusEntryHeader entry in entriesToSend)      {       if (!entry.IsEntryStatusRejCanOrBlank())       {        entry.Logs.AddNew(Events.CustomsEntryStatus, "{MESSAGE FROM SPEC HERE}");       }      }  }          ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------    DJC 22-Apr-25 08:25 GMT+01:00:  Ignorant users send a second original message, and CDS issues a new MRN, which CW1 duely stores. This causes no end of confusion.   Inhibit this action.     TODO  1. Blue validation on JobDeclarationMessageSendingObject.MessageType   2. Conditions: if the entry is not in status {REJ, CAN, blank}; and is ShouldSend is true; and if message type is NEW; then show the validation  3. Wording is "This entry is in a state such that sending an additional 'NEW' (original) message will likely result in the submission being rejected by CDS but it still issuing a replacement MRN, which {product name*} will store.  This is likely to cause significant administrative burden to resolve.  It is recommended that you do not send this message type."  *Product name, i.e "CargoWise", "CagoWise Next", etc. Get this from the shared constant.  4. If the user proceeded to send anyway, send the message as normal, but log this override as an event. Log event code CES (customs entry status), against the entry header, with reference "Additional NEW message generated when entry is in status {CH_EntryStatus}, with MRN {MRN}"    Desired effect:  Users are dicouraged from sending a second NEW message  Ultimate desired effect: we get fewer "help me unpick my mess" incidents
product_candidate: Inhibit silly users sending second original (NEW) message to CDS

WKI_Summary: PP: Prevent scanning orders at the PST loc if all items are packed and closed
details: JW6 23-Jun-25 09:19 GMT+08:00:   For functional reviewer: user is not allowed to scan a Packing station if there is any closed package now.    TG1 28-May-25 17:39 GMT+10:00:   Eg order has 10 units.  Only 5 of units has been packed into package with closed status, then user is unable to send the order to the packing station after picking.     MMC 28-May-25 09:43 GMT+10:00:   Done statement:  We cannot send an Order with closed Packages and nothing to pack to a Packing Station.    Technical Suggestion:  When checking if PackingStation is allowed for Get Next Pick, after the existing checks, also check if any Order has a closed Package. If so, do not allow PackingStation scan.  We can do this both at time of loading Pick Job (setting IsPackingStationAllowed) and when attempting to Put to Packing Station (on web service side).    CKR 06-May-25 11:50 GMT+10:00:     Current Functionality: Order with closed package (auto-pack) still able to send to packing station with ready to pack status.    Desired Functionality:  Add a validation to block packing station scan if the order has all items packed and all packages closed    Planning Poker notes:    05/05/25: Is this defective? Borderline but we will be fixing this as a normal PP item with an Update Note.  06/05/25: Add validation on the web service to only show dockdoor for packed items.
product_candidate: Prevent scanning orders at the PST loc if all items are packed and closed

WKI_Summary: Forwarding and Customs Summary - Remove Show Reversed WIP/ACR Filter
details: BACKGROUND:   Under WI00848180, we added new checkbox Do Not Show Reversed WIP/ACR Filter.   However, after reviewing it further(see Test 8 of  HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowStorageDoc&BusinessEntityPK=329d94aa-6206-48dd-964e-6289ba213534&StorageDocPK=3759108d-e0d5-4121-b13b-b619a8b1e508&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd&ServerName=ediprod.db.wtg.zone&DatabaseName=EDIPROD&Hash=%2bhwkc9Ur5V3omLnMk6mU8jXd%2fWk8j0jxp" OZ 24-Mar-25 14:08:  File WI00848245 - Forwarding and Customs Summary - Add Active Status Filter UAT_OZ Test8.xlsm (Unit Acceptance Testing), it turns out that it's not necessary to introduce the checkbox "Do NOT Show Reversed WIP/ACR" as there will be NO detailed WIP/ACR lines printed at all. Forwarding and Customs Summary report only prints the summary info (one job, one line). User could choose to toggle on/off Outstanding WIP/ACR instead.    DONE of STATEMENT:  1. Remove checkbox Do Not Show Reversed WIP/ACR Filter from Forwarding and Customs Summary report. (Backout the change from WI00848180).   If there's a charge added to the job and reversed afterwards, then the job should be printed if "Outstanding WIP/ACR" = NO. And the job should NOT be printed if "Outstanding WIP/ACR" = Yes.   2. As per the Promotion Schedule, please patch to the relevant version as WI00848180 impacted.
feature_description: Remove Show Reversed WIP/ACR Filter

WKI_Summary: Stop logging audit on OrgContact
details: BWD 23-Oct-24 11:07 GMT+11:00:   Background  HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowEditForm&ControllerID=SupportIncident&BusinessEntityPK=236cf08b-b787-4660-a871-ad22170836fe&VersionNumber=24.9.2.50&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd&Hash=%2b5vU4quW3uUc9S3Yk6fbOnP%2fXSutHSzD9" CS01713926 - WISGLOSYD - Stop logging audit on OrgContact    Problem Summary  As per: https://wisetechacademy.com/search?quickstart=c8fa9bb4-1770-46e8-ad0c-8ac0545274d9  Audit Events in the StmALog table will be deprecated    As a result, we have been asked to remove all OrgContact StmALogs    Suggested Solution  Remove new logs from being added to StmALog. This will result in logs no longer being added to the "Logs" and "Events" tabs.  Do we need to delete the old logs?    From the UPN: "A temporary registry option will be created to enable ADD, EDT and DEL logs during the migration phase."  'Workflow Triggers and Milestones can still fire for ADD and EDT events. But it cannot fire for old ADD/EDT events even though the Registry > Workflow Manager > Allow new triggers to fire for existing events option is set to Yes."    Considerations  What will happen to triggers that reference ADD/EDT contact events? Can we make them continue to work based off Audit Data (CDC) or do we need a TAN to say they will no longer work?  Are there any Macros that reference ADD/EDT contact events? There are some examples in the UPN  Does the Audit Data (CDC) contain all the information from the StmALog  If we have to delete any old logs, do these logs need to be migrated to Audit Data first?    WJG 02-Sep-24 16:32 GMT+08:00:   According to HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowEditForm&ControllerID=SupportIncident&BusinessEntityPK=236cf08b-b787-4660-a871-ad22170836fe&VersionNumber=24.9.2.50&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd&Hash=%2b5vU4quW3uUc9S3Yk6fbOnP%2fXSutHSzD9" CS01713926 - WISGLOSYD - Stop logging audit on OrgContact, we need to stop audit on OrgContact    Comment from Brett:  This should return 0 rows once this workitem is complete.  SELECT COUNT(*) from STMALOG where SL_Table = 'ORGCONTACT' and SL_SE_NKEvent in ('ADD', 'EDT', 'DEL')    Done:  StmALog doesn't create new ADD/DEL/EDT events for OrgContact.

WKI_Summary: Audit: Audit Data tab shows more than one month of data
details: Done: Customers can view more than one month's data under the Audit Data tab.    Recent changes to the Audit Data tab mean the data presented is sourced from the Audit DB.    The original implementation of this functionality included a limitation to one month's worth of data (presumably) for performance reasons.    We're now getting customer incidents (complaints) that the functionality has degraded (HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowEditForm&ControllerID=SupportIncident&BusinessEntityPK=d8154e1b-c137-42ba-a165-3a33da6b1c77&VersionNumber=25.1.14.50&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd&Hash=%2bLXPYCVJp9CN%2bmLbDqCLt2EGSABNsAsGk" CS01846691 - UNSWUKLON - Data audit log default view restricted to one month, HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowEditForm&ControllerID=SupportIncident&BusinessEntityPK=3c19165a-f2b3-4c78-877a-a5b51c56deee&VersionNumber=25.1.14.50&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd&Hash=%2b0WIgt%2fDLF0si5%2b2eu4NkNdoGP2dm36H0" CS01809448 - WISGLOSYD - View Data Version Logs restricts to one month of searching).    This is not a defect - the functionality is working as designed. However, it is PMN's opinion that these incidents will persist and customers will be unhappy until functionality is restored, at least somewhat.    We need to improve the BI functionality to allow customers to extend the maximum period of time they can view from a single query.  As the performance of the query is likely to degrade proportionate to the period of time queried, it might be useful to allow the customers to specify for themselves what period of time they query.    Please see eDocs for an example of the error message shown when the period selected exceeds one month.
product_candidate: Audit Data tab shows more than one month of data

WKI_Summary: PP: Add a Return Address on Warehouse Orders
details: AX1 28-Apr-25 14:18 GMT+08:00:   Hi product,  please refer this document for the test cases.  HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowStorageDoc&BusinessEntityPK=f46e2e0a-89ee-4971-a3e3-7da81bbeb4d1&StorageDocPK=87859199-4592-415c-949a-0c458080dde3&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd&ServerName=ediprod.db.wtg.zone&DatabaseName=ediprod&Hash=%2bEtc9rIm7D6txu3%2bCGxao1LflDdAX2eRe" AX1 28-Apr-25 14:18:  File WI00854990 Functioal Review Suggestion.docx (Functional Review Suggestion)    YSH 01-Apr-25 09:15 GMT+11:00:   Discussed with Dusan.  We simply need to add the ability to add a new address under the addresses tab for the return address.  This should also be exported in UXML.    Design as follows:   - Update WhsOrder.SupportedAddressTypesCore to now include DocAddressType.ReturnAddress   - Follow existing pattern to implement a ReturnDocAddressRequirement and ReturnDocAddress property on WhsOrder   - Update WhsOrderDataObjectWriter    - Should now populate and export the ReturnAddress on export if one is provided    - Population should just be done following same pattern as other addresses using shipmentDataObject.AddOrgAddress   - Update WhsOrderDataObjectReader    - Should now be able to add a return address to an order if one is not currently populated    - This should be done by simply adding a new branch in the overriden PopulateAdditionalAddresses method    CKR 14-Jan-25 15:10 GMT+11:00:    Current Functionality: There is no specific to poplate a return Adress on Warehouse Orders.    Desired Functionality:  Add an Return Address on Warehouse Orders.    Planning Poker Notes:    05/12/2024: Business reasons: Some retailers require to us alternate Return Address on the shipping label even if the shipment was sent by the Warehouse/DC.   This information needs to be mapped to Transtream and Smart Freight

WKI_Summary: NCTS 5 - send EORI and name/address for foreign EORI
details: KH1 01-Nov-24 09:51 GMT+00:00:   Registry setting - CargoWise\Dev\Enterprise\Product\Operations\Customs\GB\Core\Registry\Business\GBCustomsDataRegistry.cs  We already have a section for NCTS in GB, see CTC_UseDepartureIdOrArrivalId.  Add a new setting, something like "Suppress foreign EORI" (I can't think of a better concise wording) - default enabled. Country level as suggested (will show only GB companies by default in GB registry, like all the others).    CargoWise\Dev\Enterprise\Product\Operations\Customs\GB\Core\Business\NCTS\Message\Outgoing\MessageProviders\PartyProvider.cs  This is the GB base class for several kinds of entity that we might send in a message. There is already a property for "IncludeAddress" so we could add similar for "IncludeEORI" - then tweak the values of those two properties according to the registry setting, in a new descendant of PartyProvider.    Change GetConsignor and GetConsignee in CargoWise\Dev\Enterprise\Product\Operations\Customs\GB\Core\Business\NCTS\Message\Outgoing\MessageProviders\NCTSConsignmentProvider.cs to create an instance of new class instead of PartyProvider (although I see GetConsignee already has it's own ConsigneeProvider descendant, but it doesn't appear to do anything useful any more, get rid of it unless I am actually wrong).     Principal comes from HolderOfTheTransitProcedure in CargoWise\Dev\Enterprise\Product\Operations\Customs\GB\Core\Business\NCTS\Message\Outgoing\MessageProviders\Helpers\NctsDepartureHeaderProvider.cs - same deal for HolderOfTheTransitProcedureProvider which can maybe inherit the new class in place of PartyProvider.    CargoWise\Dev\Enterprise\Product\Operations\Customs\GB\Core\Business\NCTS\Message\Outgoing\MessageProviders\NCTSHouseConsignmentProvider.cs has the final two instances, GetConsignor and GetConsignee again, very similar idea to the consignment provider).    Notice that we haven't needed to change anything outside of Customs\GB - this is good, because it means we won't change anything for other NCTS countries.      MHC 25-Oct-24 16:14 GMT+02:00:   For GB only please.  Registry Setting: Company Level, show only GB Companies    DJC 18-Oct-24 09:23 GMT+01:00:  See diatribe on attached incident.   For NCTS 5, apply similar rules to what we do in CDS (HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowEditForm&ControllerID=WorkItem&BusinessEntityPK=1b1c8d1d-8982-4184-ada3-0ee80ede9ad3&VersionNumber=24.10.18.107&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd&Hash=%2b7Awnd4i8P8v0P16P3jcBoevGTgUg%2bWD%2f" WI00809898 - CDS exports: Suppress foreign EORI in 3/10 exporter like we did for imports and WI00514730 )    1. For Principal, Consignment(header) consignee, consignment (header) consignor, house consignee, house consignor  2. If the EORI does not start with GB or XI, then send only name/address.  If EORI starts with GB or XI, send only EORI in the identication field  3. Add a new registry item to revert this feature - when enabled (default), apply the new rules as above; when overridden to disable, apply old rules (always send EORI if present).   4. Applies to IE015, IE013 and IE170    Done: data sent to customs uses only EORI for XI GB; for foreign traders we send only name address; the IE029 which comes back contains name/address data (instead of "---" dashes) for foreign parties and this is printed.
feature_description: send EORI and name/address for foreign EORI

WKI_Summary: SQL CPU Usage alert for Customs - 923FDBF25632C9E73D16224C24BE6824
details: KGG 08-Oct-25 18:06 GMT+11:00:   Have returned from leave but (during my absence) one issue was identified with the chunker I created for this WI, currently discussing with the SQL capability the most optimal way to remedy the issue    KGG 29-Aug-25 16:01 GMT+10:00:   Update: Code was complete, however was iterated because of an issue encountered during UAT - currently in the process of investigating/fixing what caused ODT to throw an error during UAT    KGG 19-Jun-25 11:33 GMT+10:00:   The high number of reads presumably comes from the fact that this transformation chunks along the PK column. I'll  switch so that, instead, it chunks along the clustered index. If the table doesn't have a clustered index or the clustered index is on a column whose type could potentially have too many ties to be helpful (like a bit or a binary) then the fallback is to chunk along the PK column. Chunking along the PK column is a last-resort.    Details  WTG Query Hash HYPERLINK "https://eye.wtg.ws/s/wisecloud-support/app/discover#/?_g=(filters:!(),refreshInterval:(pause:!t,value:0),time:(from:now-7d%2Fd,to:now))&_a=(columns:!(System,WtgQueryHash,Owner,CpuTimeMilliseconds,Qty,LogicalReads,PhysicalReads,Writes,ExeDate),filters:!(('$state':(store:appState),meta:(alias:!n,disabled:!f,index:f869ba17-8818-56c3-8b70-c74095a6801d,key:WtgQueryHash,negate:!f,params:(query:'923FDBF25632C9E73D16224C24BE6824'),type:phrase),query:(match_phrase:(WtgQueryHash:'923FDBF25632C9E73D16224C24BE6824')))),index:f869ba17-8818-56c3-8b70-c74095a6801d,interval:auto,query:(language:kuery,query:''),sort:!(!(CpuTimeMilliseconds,desc)))" 923FDBF25632C9E73D16224C24BE6824  Product CW1  System Customs  Time Collected 2025-06-13 02:02:58Z  Rule Id fd8999b7-8f87-4e14-a54e-48b066238c6f  Affected Client ALL     Statistics  Occurrences 1,431  CPU Time (ms) 10,090,842  Reads 1,878,508,024  Writes 584    Help  HYPERLINK "https://wisetechglobal.sharepoint.com/Development/Development%20Wiki/CPUUsageDashboard.aspx" Working with kibana  HYPERLINK "https://wisetechglobal.sharepoint.com/Development/Development%20Wiki/SQL%20Query%20Performance%20Tuning.aspx" SQL query performance tuning    If this issue is duplicate or is addressed in another WI please add it as prerequisite to this WI and keep this WI open until the prerequisite is closed.

WKI_Summary: eTail V2 Remove Convert to Org from Convert to Stand Alone Declaration Action
details: QL 19-Aug-25 17:19 GMT+10:00:     BACKGROUND: we have added a 'Convert Party Addresses to Organizations' action on HVLV menu and Consignment action menu in HYPERLINK "https://ediprod.cw.wisetechglobal.com/link/ShowEditForm/WorkItem/5724f03e-970a-4cea-8231-96b2ae425579?lang=en-gb" WI00894707 - eTail V2 Bulk Convert Parties to Orgs on HVLV to support 'Convert to Org'. So instead of bundling 'Convert to Org' and 'Convert to Stand Alone Declaration' together in the current 'Convert to Stand Alone Declaration' action, we can now de-couple the 2 functionalities:      * Convert Party Addresses to Organizations - handles 'Convert to Org' only  * Convert to Stand Alone Declaration - handles 'Convert to Declaration' only      DONE: 'Convert to Org' functionality is removed from current 'Convert to Stand Alone Declaration' action. (it should cover both HVLV menu and Consignment action menu).        NOTE: If free text parties are detected while using 'Convert to Stand Alone Declaration' action, pointing the user to use 'Convert Party Addresses to Organizations' action, otherwise continue conversion with free text parties.
product_candidate: eTail V2 Remove Convert to Org from Convert to Stand Alone Declaration Action

WKI_Summary: PP: Add Distribution Center Org to Order, Pick and Release Screens
details: SF 10-Apr-25 13:25 GMT+10:00:   column for Distribution Center Name no longer as a Customisable column  Talked to LBM and he advises Maciej said to remove     J47 25-Mar-25 17:59 GMT+11:00:    For Functional Review - on Order, Picking & Release modules:   - New "Distribution Center" Filter - has 4 comparison operators: equal, not equal, is blank & is not blank   - New "Distribution Center Name" Filter - has all the comparison operators   - New "Distribution Center" Column - should display the client code      - Column name when shortened = "Dist. Center"      - Column is shown by default - when you right click & open 'Customize Columns', you can successfully add & remove the column   - New "Distribution Center Name" Column - should display the client name      - Column name when shortened = "Dist. Centre Name"      - Column is hidden by default - when you right click & open 'Customize Columns', you can successfully add & remove the column   - Please also do a regression test on the Distribution Center Organization tab box on the Order/Pick/Release entry screen.    ***Please update the labels on the update note. We use American English so it will show as "Center" instead of "Centre"    BRS 12-Mar-25 08:46 GMT+11:00:   Add the grid column for Distribution Center to Order/Pick/Release, also a filter in these modules -- follow the design used by existing jobdobaddress like Consignee, Transport Company.    Expose a Distribution Center + Distribution Centre Name property on Orders, plural version on Pick/Release (see GetSingleValueOrManyText helper method)    Ensure we expose the other comparison operators as was done in HYPERLINK "https://svc-ediprod.wtg.zone/Services/link/ShowEditForm/NewWorkItem/c29db318-32ac-47d4-a15e-787adba15c20?lang=en-gb" WI00870688 - MCM: Improve Transport Company Filter in Warehouse Order module    CKR 14-Jan-25 14:53 GMT+11:00:     Current Functionality: Distribution Center Org is not available as a filter/column on Order, Pick and Release screens    Desired Functionality: Distribution Center Org is Added as a filter/column on Order, Pick and Release screens    Planning Poker Notes:    20/11/24: Client works with large retailers in the US. They are working on expanding to even more ( such as Target in the US) and this will become even more important.  They currently use SQL queries ( order > find > custom sql search) for each DC, however this is not feasable long term as they keep expanding and shipping to more and more DCs. WKI_Summary: Plan Pick from ModulaVSL to Modula picking station handover
details: DBE 19-Sep-25 09:05 GMT+10:00:   For functional reviewer:  Two new Fact properties have been added to allocation location (same place as Is Allocated on Pick)   => Is Material Handling Equipment Storage     - this requires turning on EnableHandoverLocations registry setting and having location with a mhe device in it.  I have added 3 devices in 3 locations in the MAT warehouse on the test rig:  Location String  Device Name  05-7-6    MHE Device 003  03-3-4    MHE Device 001  05-8-4      MHE Device 002       - Can Satisfy Entire Pick  This is avaliable without any registry and will return true is the entire ordered stock from a pick can be picked from 1 location completely.  This will need to tested with a few scenarios as this should would with all attributes.  Note: this WI will need a update note for Can Satisfy Entire Pick.    DBE/WI00958775_PlanPickFrom_ModulaVSLToHandoverLocation  HYPERLINK "https://github.com/WiseTechGlobal/Glow/pull/9926" WI00958775 - Plan Pick from ModulaVSL to Modula picking station handover by DavidBartimoteWTG · Pull Request #9926 · WiseTechGlobal/Glow  HYPERLINK "https://github.com/WiseTechGlobal/CargoWise.Shared/pull/5337" WI00958775 - Plan Pick from ModulaVSL to Modula picking station handover by DavidBartimoteWTG · Pull Request #5337 · WiseTechGlobal/CargoWise.Shared  HYPERLINK "https://github.com/WiseTechGlobal/CargoWise/pull/13944" WI00958775 - Plan Pick from ModulaVSL to Modula picking station by DavidBartimoteWTG · Pull Request #13944 · WiseTechGlobal/CargoWise    DBE 11-Sep-25 16:00 GMT+10:00:   Design   -> Update facts to improve Mhe allocation   => Add IsMHE to IAllocationLocationFact (like IsDynamicPickFace)   => Add CanSatisfyEntirePick to IAllocationLocationFact    MMC: Wouldn't this be on the location?    DBE: Correct, moving to IAllocationLocationFact.  -> Remove HND locs from consideration in AllocationFactLoader   => Remove IsHandoverLocation from WhsPickAvailableInventory     MMC: Should we just exclude HandOver locations from available inventory entirely? Do we ever see them as allocateable inventory?     DBE: True, will update WhsPickAvailableInventoryCollection.IsValidLocationForOrderedInventory to filter out handover locations   => use this to filter out HND locations in AllocationFactLoader.GetAllocationFacts like !IsPickByBOMKitInventory    EKO 11-Sep-25 09:45 GMT+10:00:   in overall design  HYPERLINK "https://ediprod.cw.wisetechglobal.com/link/ShowEditForm/WorkItem/adcd7cb6-739b-4692-9b76-710c0be58f94?lang=en-gb" WI00918138 - CW OUT: Picking assignment to MHE it is   Plan Pick from ModulaVSL to corresponding Modula picking station handover location   -> Update facts to improve Mhe allocation    => Add IsMHE to IWarehouseLocationFact    => Add CanSatisfyEntirePick to IAvailableInventoryFact   -> Remove HND locs from consideration in AllocationFactLoader      Plan Pick from ModulaVSL to corresponding Modula picking station handover location      Picking process flow:    When allocation happens CargoWise decides that products A, B, C are to be picked from MOdula VSL (MDL1) and product D is to be picked from normal(reserve) location.  CargoWise to create pick for products A, B, C to be picked from Modula MDL1 to Modula picking station (MPS1 - an outbound handover location linked to Modula MDL1)     We need tomake sure pick is planned to the outbound handover location instead of Dock Door   DBE: WhsPick cartonization can group products by Area into batches, we could make Mhes specific areas (+ extend to include Mhe ids) for this batching. (This is prevent non-Mhe stock being cartonized in same package as mhe stock)

WKI_Summary: PP: Ability to populate component attributes on final BOM product
details: MXL 05-Sep-25 09:24 GMT+08:00:   for funtional review:  Check the new settings on BOM product configuration GUI:  the tick box against BOM product: "Use Earliest Component Expiry Date on Assembly"  the tick boxes against the component’s product attribute: "Use Attribute 1 on Kit", "Use Attribute 2 on Kit", "Use Attribute 3 on Kit" and "Use Serial Number on Kit"    Assembling a kit:  verify the populate component attributes on final BOM product by work order  verify the populate component attributes on final BOM product by order with pickByBOM, and including the outbound transfer case    CSV import & native xml import:  for CSV import, verify the case to disable attributes on BOM product relationship  for native xml import, verify the case to disable attributes on BOM product relationship, import the UseEarliestExpiryDateFromComponentsOnAssembly on BOM product, import the UsePartAttrib1FromComponentOnKit, UsePartAttrib2FromComponentOnKit, UsePartAttrib3FromComponentOnKit,UseSerialFromComponentOnKit on components of BOM product    MMC 28-May-25 12:20 GMT+10:00:   Done Statement:  Component Attributes can be copied to final BOM product    Technical Suggestion:  Add two columns to OrgSupplierPart:    OP_UseEarliestExpiryDateFromComponentsWhenAssembled  OP_UseEarliestPackingDateFromComponentsWhenAssembled // not sure there is a valid use case for this yet BRS: I wouldn't do this? Packing is a property of the kit, not the components. Crossing it out as I thought we discussed that.    Add four bit columns to OrgPartBOM:  OE_UsePartAttrib1FromComponentOnKit  OE_UsePartAttrib2FromComponentOnKit  OE_UsePartAttrib3FromComponentOnKit  OE_UseSerialFromComponentOnKit    for each OrgPartBOM attribute column only one component can specify that it goes to the kit. So add unique index per OE_OP_MainProduct to enforce this (as well as validation).    additional validation should run - if OP_UseEarliestExpiryDateFromComponentsWhenAssembled is true, the BOM product must have an Expiry Date on at least one org part relation, otherwise show an error.  do the same for all other attributes.  BRS: All of these validations must also be checked at the OrgPartRelation, so we can't disable the product's use of the attribute    additionally for OP_UseEarliestExpiryDateFromComponentsWhenAssembled & OP_UseEarliestPackingDateFromComponentsWhenAssembled at least one component must have an expiry/packing date specified on at least one org part relation.    for OE_UsePartAttrib1FromComponentOnKit (and all other component attrib columns) if it is true, the linked Component product must have that attribute specified on at least one org part relation, otherwise show an error.    for OE_UseSerialFromComponentOnKit additionally add validation that the component quantity can only be 1, otherwise show an error.    when assembling a kit on work order  , check the BOM config (no te we should also do this for PBB):  OP_UseEarliestExpiryDateFromComponentsWhenAssembled  go through each component used for the kit's assembly and find the earliest expiry date and use that as the kit's expiry date.    OP_UseEarliestPackingDateFromComponentsWhenAssembled  go through each component used for the kit's assembly and find the earliest packing date and use that as the kit's packing date.    OE_UsePartAttrib1FromComponentOnKit  find the single component that has this setting - if there is one, check if there is a unique value of this attribute (in case multiple attributes are used for this kit), if there is, set that as the kit's part attrib 1    OE_UsePartAttrib2FromComponentOnKit  find the single component that has this setting - if there is one, check if there is a unique value of this attribute (in case multiple attributes are used for this kit), if there is, set that as the kit's part attrib 2    OE_UsePartAttrib3FromComponentOnKit  find the single component that has this setting - if there is one, check if there is a unique value of this attribute (in case multiple attributes are used for this kit), if there is, set that as the kit's part attrib 3    OE_UseSerialFromComponentOnKit  find the single component that has this setting - if there is one, check if there is a unique value of this attribute (in case multiple serials are used for this kit), if there is, set that as the kit's serial    CKR 06-May-25 11:45 GMT+10:00:     Current Functionality:  Final BOM product is treated as an individual product with its own product master settings. If product is attribute required, User need to re-scan the information again.    Desired Functionality:  Addtional option under Product Mater BOM configuration, which allows user to select which component attribute should be copied to the final BOM kit    Planning Poker Notes:    19/3: Customer business: BOM product = Nokia Phone + Sim Card (Serial number + IME number). When create WO, the final BOM proudct is uing SIM card serial number + IME number. it is very time consuming to rescan each serial number and IMEI number, especially the order is about 3 pallets  05/05/25: This is a specific case, but we would need to solve this in a generic way as there are more broad use cases.  For example, Delmar would like to have the final kit with the earliest expiry date across all the components.   06/05/25: What is the case for Packing date? For Product to investigate during Draft Update Note task  Potential solution: add additional columns for part attributes 1/2/3 + serial numbers at the BOM config + a general checkbox for the expiry date attribute to get the earliest expiry date value by default.
product_candidate: Ability to populate component attributes on final BOM product

WKI_Summary: Receiving Agent’s BIN number to default to MAWB/FWB for imports to BD
details: Regulation: the Business Identification Number (BIN) officially replaced the (AIN) for customs purposes on July 1, 2023. This change was implemented via General Order No: 23/2023/Customs, issued by the HYPERLINK "https://urldefense.com/v3/__https:/www.google.com/search?sca_esv=0de3656c54fa3244&rlz=1C1GCEA_enAE1061AE1061&cs=0&q=National*Board*of*Revenue&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwji_tG_-ISPAxVbov0HHcCxLxIQxccNegQIAhAC&mstk=AUtExfB02DkI5AV01hp4Uznpe37-f6mIyPLyUmaxVeCfK6LjXvG3IipTaSAHOkxjxLnpFenkX7z_c1TD0FP4jx-M40WHfQPkd19-UzSgrEpHB6K1d0B0eRaTdIa8t2Uvl0pnBpQ&csui=3__;Kysr!!Na5NE8kfbMIR6Ys!of93DNlpN8SRsASKexMVnPPfK-bRsrqxV4omNXRMo_C_rZdUe6QkH36eyHaYK0ELpP3wyrZj1nlvZnAtZ3sgP8_HDJQLRvcAfA$" National Board of Revenue, Bangladesh Customs Authority, on June 12, 2023. Failure to provide accurate and complete goods declarations or correct customs value may result in custom fines or penalties.    Done: The Consol's Receiving  Agent’s Business Identification Number (BIN) to default to MAWB/FWB for imports to Bangladesh when the Consol Type is not DRT – Direct. If no BIN number for the organisation exists, as a fallback, we will default the AIN (Agent Identification Number).    Format: The BIN is a 13-digit number must have 14 characters in total including the dash, (e.g., 000903944-0101)      RJV 28-Aug-25 09:45 GMT+10:00:   DEV: Please use 'Document Organisation Registration Mapping' reference file to configure and get number type and direction.      M04 29-Aug-25 13:12 GMT+10:00:     Please Add fallback to AIN default should be BIN  https://github.com/WiseTechGlobal/CargoWise/blame/bc3cd2d1477d1d7530cb93757d3e8c3af80007a4/Enterprise/Product/Operations/Freight/Forwarding/Forwarding.Business/ExportAWB/ExportAWBHeader/ConsolExportAWBHeader.cs#L2604C4-L2604C83    change in https://github.com/WiseTechGlobal/CargoWise/blob/bc3cd2d1477d1d7530cb93757d3e8c3af80007a4/Enterprise/Product/Operations/MasterFiles/Business/MasterFiles.Business/Organisation/Other/OrgCusCode/Countries/BangladeshOrgCusCodeInfo.cs#L14  and  https://github.com/WiseTechGlobal/CargoWise/blob/bc3cd2d1477d1d7530cb93757d3e8c3af80007a4/Enterprise/Product/Operations/Freight/Forwarding/Documents/DocDataObjects/CarrierMessage/CarrierMessageDataBuilder.cs#L589    related work item HYPERLINK "https://svc-ediprod.wtg.zone/Services/edit/WI/WI00350929" WI00350929     Because we are adding a fallback for AIN, we need to add a row in RefDocOrgCusCode  We need to have validation for BIN
product_candidate: Receiving Agent’s BIN number to default to MAWB/FWB for imports to BD

WKI_Summary: eTail v2 - Pre-Screening - Update Event Reference in Consignment logs
details: SWJ 30-Jul-25 16:22 GMT+10:00:     BACKGROUND:  This WI is to enhance the existing logic that was implemented in HYPERLINK "https://ediprod.cw.wisetechglobal.com/link/ShowEditForm/WorkItem/bccefbcf-cb9b-4e9e-8c97-56838145ea66?lang=en-gb" WI00921014 - eTail v2 - Pre-Screening - Add Consignment logs     DONE:  1. Update existing logic that only includes the applicable "Message Text" in the STU Event Reference when a screening value is triggered and the "Add Event" checkbox in the HVLV Pre-Screening registry setting is ticked for the applicable field, to:  include the "Message Text Per Value" instead if it is provided for the triggered screening value, and use the "Message Text" as fallback.    Note 1: If multiple screening values for a field on a HVLV Consignment are triggered, separate these via a semicolon (';'), e.g. |TYP=Pre-Screening|RES= ERR on Goods Description: tobacco is restricted;cigarettes need a permit ERR on Goods Value: over the limit  Note 2: Should the message text(s) exceed the STU event reference description character limit then we should truncate the message text(s) as required (which may lead to some message text(s) not fully being displayed in the event description, however we expect this to be an unlikely scenario).
feature_description: Pre-Screening - Update Event Reference in Consignment logs

HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowStorageDoc&BusinessEntityPK=4204b493-eec1-428a-a324-69ecb3695573&StorageDocPK=b8d39019-e216-4d49-8d08-fd04be15555a&Hash=%2bNSG7aGA4oILap7mn5PXFxBTMuPuxfA1c&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd" DJC 27-Sep-24 17:01:  File e214932c290d47f5b4e145daeed152ef.tif (Internal Correspondence) added to eDocs tab.  Remove " (CSP) " from it.       CKG 02-Oct-24 21:04 GMT+01:00:     Tech Design:    1. This validation can be found in C:\git\wtg\CargoWise\Dev\Enterprise\Product\Operations\MasterFiles\Business\MasterFiles.Business\Organisation\Other\OrgCusCode\OrgCusCodeValidation.cs  Method: ValidateCustomsCodeForGB    Please remove the relevant validation error (You can remove the whole else if block)    2. The description of config code type TRN can be found in C:\git\wtg\CargoWise\Dev\Enterprise\Product\Operations\MasterFiles\Business\MasterFiles.Business\Organisation\Main\OrgHelperClasses\OrgCodeLists.cs    Please just add  "(Obsolete)" in front of the current description    3. The ZG_Gateway field is currently defined in the EU solution in C:\git\wtg\CargoWise\Dev\Enterprise\Product\Operations\Customs\EU\Core\GUI\JobDeclaration\JobDeclarationUserControl.Designer.cs  And this is where it's CaptionResourceString is set to be "CSP".  We need to change this to "Gateway" but only for GB declarations.  The current way of setting this caption is not the best way to do it.  We should instead add a ResourceStringDataattribute to the properly bound to the control, in this case ZG_Gateway    See how in C:\git\wtg\CargoWise\Dev\Enterprise\Product\Operations\Customs\EU\Core\Business\Declaration\JobDeclaration\AutoJobDeclaration.cs there is a virtual ZG_Gateway property.  We first need to override this in the actual EU JobDeclaration class C:\git\wtg\CargoWise\Dev\Enterprise\Product\Operations\Customs\EU\Core\Business\Declaration\JobDeclaration\JobDeclaration.cs   By doing something like     [ResourceStringData("{0C95C554-7FC9-4528-9A99-A662817238BE}", Caption = "CSP")]  public override ZString ZG_Gateway  {   get => base.ZG_Gateway;   set => base.ZG_Gateway = value;  }    This will keep the caption the same for EU and all the countries inheriting from it.     We will then need to add another override for GB in C:\git\wtg\CargoWise\Dev\Enterprise\Product\Operations\Customs\GB\Core\Business\Declaration\JobDeclaration.cs    Something like    [ResourceStringData("D82350F4-D6C4-4EE7-A0E4-50B9BDF9D062", Caption = "Gateway")]  public override ZString ZG_Gateway  {   get => base.ZG_Gateway;   set => base.ZG_Gateway = value;  }    Note how we have now changed the caption to Gateway for GB jobs    We can then go back and remove the following line from C:\git\wtg\CargoWise\Dev\Enterprise\Product\Operations\Customs\EU\Core\GUI\JobDeclaration\JobDeclarationUserControl.Designer.cs    this.GatewayDropEdit.CaptionResourceString = Enterprise.Customs.EU.GUI.Res.GetData("EUJobDeclarationUserControl|0ed792bb-219b-43ea-b09a-f300cb0900a7", "CSP");    Please ensure you generate new GUID's for the above overrides    Please check for a few EU countires that the caption remains 'CSP' and that for GB jobs it is now 'Gateway'    4.  The validation error message can be found in C:\git\wtg\CargoWise\Dev\Enterprise\Product\Operations\Customs\GB\Core\Business\Declaration\AddInfoJobDeclarationValidation.cs    Please just remove the "(CSP)" from the message

WKI_Summary: EG e-Invoice- Set AR Transaction Status Baed on the Enable Notification Registry
details: A25 14-Jan-25 17:53 GMT+03:00:     In order to enable the notifications from ETA, we are going to add a new registry for Egypt with the below WI.    HYPERLINK "edient:Command=ShowEditForm&ControllerID=WorkItem&BusinessEntityPK=da59c548-8e7f-4c29-9527-8646de2c4cca&VersionNumber=25.1.14.50&Domain=wtg.zone&Instance=ediProd&Hash=%2bcSnUwb%2fHg24HrXLs4MP19y8S17JDxYeb" WI00853326 - EG eInv -Add New Registry To Set Transaction Status Based on Enabling ETA Notify    In this WI we will decide the on the pivot status of the transaction based on the registry value.    DOF ;    If the registry is set to 'No', the transaction status will be set to SUC only if it is DLV in the inbound XUE. Otherwise, the status received in the inbound XUE will be used as is.    If the registry is set to 'Yes' then set the transaction status based on the received value in the inbound XUE      Update Note:    https://wisetechglobal.sharepoint.com/:w:/r/sites/DevelopmentAccountingTeam143/Shared%20Documents/Kaustubh%20Phatak/Testing/2025/05%20May/UPN%20-%20EG%20eInvoice%20Receiving%20Notifications%20For%20Invoice%20Status.docx?d=w0a5f2b7400e544e495a534725be51db6&csf=1&web=1&e=jnXYWi
